column4: newbie to ubuntu here. wondering if some one could help me out
i've download the 32 bit and 64 but iso. iso burned it to a cd. correctly...and i reboot and it goes right back into windows
and my bios is set to boot to cdrom, i've confirmed and done so with another working cd for drive backup
your system is probably set not to boot from the cd-rom before the hard drive. you may need to go into your bios and change that around.
